mapper.insert: insert into KBL_player (player_name, player_height, player_teamnumber, player_team, player_position, player_img) values (#{player_name}, #{player_height}, #{player_teamnumber}, #{player_team}, #{player_position}, #{player_img})
mapper.select: select player_name, player_height, player_teamnumber, player_team, player_position, player_img from KBL_player limit #{index}, 12
